Reviews.Title: Good for home use
Reviews.Author: shynesh
Reviews.Content: really good for home use.Battery life getting more than 3hrsvalue for money is good.processor speed is good.

Reviews.Title: Not the best Windows laptop. Definitely not the best.
Reviews.Author: JROnline
Reviews.Content: Ok performance, but it's nothing to brag about. Whatever you do, don't buy this one. It may have an average 350 GB of hard disk space, but it really doesn't deserve any use.

ProductInfo.Features:
2nd generation Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2348M Processor
4GB DDR3 System Memory,500GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
15.6-inch diagonal High Definition HP BrightView LED Display (1366 x 768)
Windows 8 64-bit, Black
